mapper.update: UPDATE PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_INSPEC_TASK T SET T.IS_VALID = '0' WHERE T.INSPEC_ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT T.ID, T.INSPEC_ID, T.INSPEC_NAME, TO_CHAR(T.START_TIME, 'yyyy-MM-dd') START_TIME, TO_CHAR(T.END_TIME,'yyyy-MM-dd') END_TIME, T.C_USER_ID, T.C_USER_NAME, T.C_USER_REGION, T.R_USER_ID, T.R_USER_NAME, T.R_USER_REGION, T.HQ_CHANL_ID, T.CHANL_NAME, T.INSPEC_SUM, T.REMARK, T.IS_VALID, T.INSPEC_TYPE, T.CREATE_TIME, T.C_USER_REGION_LEVEL, T.R_USER_REGION_LEVEL, T.R_PHONE, T.REGISTER_SUM, T.C_PHONE, T.CHANL_TYPE FROM PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_INSPEC_TASK T WHERE T.INSPEC_ID = #{inspec_id} AND T.IS_VALID = '1'

update.if: MERGE INTO PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_INSPEC_TASK T1 USING ( SELECT #{id} AS ID, #{inspec_id} AS INSPEC_ID, #{inspec_name} AS INSPEC_NAME, to_date(#{start_time},'yyyy-MM-dd') AS START_TIME, to_date(#{end_time},'yyyy-MM-dd') AS END_TIME, #{c_user_id} AS C_USER_ID, #{c_user_name} AS C_USER_NAME, #{c_user_region} AS C_USER_REGION, #{r_user_id} AS R_USER_ID, #{r_user_name} AS R_USER_NAME, #{r_user_region} AS R_USER_REGION, #{hq_chanl_id} AS HQ_CHANL_ID, #{chanl_name} AS CHANL_NAME, #{inspec_sum} AS INSPEC_SUM, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS REMARK, #{inspec_type} AS INSPEC_TYPE, #{c_user_region_level} AS C_USER_REGION_LEVEL, #{r_user_region_level} AS R_USER_REGION_LEVEL, #{r_phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS R_PHONE, #{c_phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AS C_PHONE, #{chanl_type} AS CHANL_TYPE FROM DUAL ) T2 ON (T1.INSPEC_ID = T2.INSPEC_ID AND T1.HQ_CHANL_ID = T2.HQ_CHANL_ID AND T1.R_USER_ID = T2.R_USER_ID AND T1.INSPEC_TYPE = T2.INSPEC_TYPE) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET T1.INSPEC_SUM = T2.INSPEC_SUM,T1.INSPEC_NAME = T2.INSPEC_NAME, T1.START_TIME = T2.START_TIME,T1.END_TIME = T2.END_TIME, T1.REMARK = T2.REMARK WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(T1.ID,T1.INSPEC_ID,T1.INSPEC_NAME,T1.START_TIME,T1.END_TIME,T1.C_USER_ID, T1.C_USER_NAME,T1.C_USER_REGION,T1.R_USER_ID,T1.R_USER_NAME,T1.R_USER_REGION, T1.HQ_CHANL_ID,T1.CHANL_NAME,T1.INSPEC_SUM,T1.REMARK,T1.IS_VALID,T1.INSPEC_TYPE, T1.CREATE_TIME,T1.C_USER_REGION_LEVEL,T1.R_USER_REGION_LEVEL,T1.R_PHONE, T1.C_PHONE,T1.CHANL_TYPE) VALUES(T2.ID,T2.INSPEC_ID,T2.INSPEC_NAME,T2.START_TIME, T2.END_TIME,T2.C_USER_ID,T2.C_USER_NAME,T2.C_USER_REGION,T2.R_USER_ID, T2.R_USER_NAME,T2.R_USER_REGION,T2.HQ_CHANL_ID,T2.CHANL_NAME,T2.INSPEC_SUM, T2.REMARK,'1',T2.INSPEC_TYPE,SYSDATE,T2.C_USER_REGION_LEVEL, T2.R_USER_REGION_LEVEL,T2.R_PHONE,T2.C_PHONE,T2.CHANL_TYPE)

UPDATE PORTAL.TAB_PORTAL_INSPEC_TASK T1 SET T1.INSPEC_NAME=#{inspec_name}, T1.START_TIME=to_date(#{start_time},'yyyy-MM-dd'), T1.END_TIME=to_date(#{end_time},'yyyy-MM-dd'), T1.REMARK= #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T1.R_USER_ID=#{r_user_id}, T1.R_USER_NAME=#{r_user_name}, T1.R_USER_REGION=#{r_user_region}, T1.R_USER_REGION_LEVEL=#{r_user_region_level}, T1.R_PHONE= #{r_phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, T1.CHANL_TYPE= #{chanl_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE T1.INSPEC_ID=#{inspec_id}
